The day of salvation, or, A homily upon the bloody sacrifice of Christ, or his death and passion written, and intended onely for private meditation of a most noble and vertuous lady, on Good-Friday last, but since thought worthy the publique view / by Anthony Stafford ... Stafford, Anthony.
[22], 168 [i.e. 164] p.
By N. and I. Okes, for Daniel Frere at the Red Bull in Little Brittaine, Printed at London : 1635.
Signatures: A¹²(-A1) B-G¹² H¹⁰. Errors in paging: numbers 114, 119-121 skipped in the pagination. Imperfect: engraved t.p. lacking; tightly bound, with slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
